Event.name: Post_lose_possession
Event.definition: <def-root>The subframe of Relinquish in which the <fen>Owner</fen> (= Donor) no longer has the <fen>Possession</fen> (=Theme).</def-root>

Arg.name: Owner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that no longer owns the posession.</def-root>

Arg.name: Possession
Arg.definition: <def-root>The thing which was owned by the <fen>Owner</fen>. (This does not include bodyparts or medical conditions, but does include intellectual property, etc.)</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the possession state which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Post_lose_possession event occurs. </def-root>
